presentation.title: Dzidzira kwekubvunzisisa kwako kwebasa!
presentation.message:
Kutora kubvunzurudzwa kwebasa kwakuita kuti utye uye uchinetseka here?
Zvimwe uchiri kunzwa usina kugadzirira kutora kubvunzurudzwa kwebasa?
Iyi ndiyo yakakwana app yekudzidzira hunyanzvi hwako hwekutaura mukurangana kwebasa rebasa!

presentation.title: Gadzirira basa rako rinotevera!
presentation.message: Jobho antelliviewer anoshandisa simba rehungwaru hwekungwarira kuti ubudirire hwekurindira kweruzivo rwekukubatsira kusarudzika kwehupenyu hwekuita kuti uwedzere kuraramisa uye kuita kuti iwe ugadzirire kuongororwa kwako kwechokwadi hurukuro yechokwadi.

presentation.title: Yekutanga kunyoreswa:
presentation.message: Gamuchira mushumo pakupera kwekubvunzurudza kwega kwega kupfupisa hurukuro nemhinduro uye zano rekuti ungagadzirisa sei mikana yako yekubatwa mukubvunzurudzwa kwebasa chairo.

list.title: Delete nhoroondo?
list.message: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kudzima nhoroondo yese?

entry.title: Delete kubvunzurudza?
entry.message: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kudzima iyi kubvunzurudza?

validation.title: Kukanganisa kwechokwadi
validation.invalid_fields:
Isa basa rinoshanda basa rekunyorera basa rekubvunzurudza basa idzva.
Neimwe nzira

color_scheme.name: Theme dingindira
color_scheme.description:
Sarudza pakati pechiedza uye dingle theme.
Otomatiki otomatiki kune iyo kifaa dingindira kekutanga nguva yaunovhura iyo app.

language.name: Mutauro
language.description: Sarudza mutauro wakaratidzirwa kuratidza uku uchishandisa application uye kutaura kune AI panguva yekubvunzurudzwa.

cooldown.description:
Iyo yemahara vhezheni yeApp inokubvumira kuti utore kubvunzurudza kweawa.

Kana iwe uchida kubvisa izvo zvisingakwanisi, bvisa kushambadzira, uye ugamuchire mushumo wekupa zano nezve kuti ungavandudza sei mushure mekubvunzurudza kwega kwega, funga kunyoresa kuPremium.
cooldown.active:
Mirira iyo inotonhorera timer usati wabuditsa kubvunzurudzwa kutsva.

Kana iwe uchida kubvisa collowns, bvisa kushambadzira, uye gamuchira mushumo wekupa zano nezano rekuvandudza mushure mekubvunzurudza kwega kwega, funga kunyorera mari.

review.request:
Kana iwe wanga uchida iyo app, ndapota fungai kusiya ongororo kutibatsira.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Kubvunzurudza kutsva kunowanikwa!
new_interview.message: Iwe une kubvunzurudza kutsva kunowanikwa kuti utore pabasa rebasa.

subscription.title: Premium
subscription.thanks: Ndatenda nekunyorera kuPremium! Tinokushuvira rombo rakanaka uye kubudirira pane zvese zvako zvenguva yemberi kubvunzurudzwa!

error.subscription_options:
Hatikwanise kurodha zvinonyoreswa zvirongwa.

Ndapota, tarisa yako internet kubatana, kana edza zvakare gare gare.

error.title: Kukanganisa
error.unexpected: Chimwe chinhu chakatadza ... iwe ungagona kunge usingaone izvi! üò±
error.connection_fix: Tarisa yako Internet kubatana uye edza zvakare gare gare.

store.short_description: Dzidzira kwekubvunzana kwako kwebasa neiyi chaiyo AI Simulator
store.full_description:
Kutora kubvunzurudzwa kwebasa kwakuita kuti utye uye uchinetseka here?
Zvimwe uchiri kunzwa usina kugadzirira kutora kubvunzurudzwa kwebasa?
Iyi ndiyo yakakwana app yekudzidzira hunyanzvi hwako hwekutaura mukurangana kwebasa rebasa!

Jobho antelliviewer anoshandisa simba rehungwaru hwekunyepedzera kuti vabate basa rezvekutaurirana kwekunakidzwa kwehunyanzvi hwekukurukurirana kwehupenyu chaihwo hunotambidza uye kukugadzirira kuti ade kubvunzana kwako kunotevera.

Kubvunzurudzwa kwakarongedzwa kune chinzvimbo chebasa iwe wauri kutsvaga, uye kuchagadziriswa uye kugadziriswa nemibvunzo zvine chekuita nezvinangwa zvako zvinomiririra zvakanaka kubvunzurudzwa kwebasa rechokwadi.

Vashandisi vekutanga vanogashirawo mushumo pakupera kwekubvunzurudza kwega kwega kutaurirana nekutaura nekupa mhinduro uye zano rekuti vangavandudza sei mikana yako yekubatwa mukubvunzurudzwa kwebasa rebasa rechokwadi.
taglines: Ace yako inotevera Job hurukuro naAi!
Yako inotevera nyanzvi kubudirira kwakamirira iwe pano!
premium_benefits: Gamuchira mishumo ine mhinduro uye zano
Gamuchira mishumo ine mhinduro uye kuraira mushure mekubvunzurudza

translation.title: Batsira Kududzira
translation.description: Rubatsiro shandura iyi kune mimwe mitauro.
